About the Company: Bloom Dekor Ltd. is one the largest manufacturers and exporters of high-pressure decorative laminates in India. The company also manufactures and sells laminated sheets and wood engineered doors, which belong to the same product group of furnishing and construction material.The company`s range of products include Standard grade laminates, Post-forming laminates, Compact laminates,Desk grade laminates,Sandwich Laminates,Industrial Laminates, Backing Laminates,Marker Grade Laminates,Chalk grade Laminates,Translucent Laminates ,Core laminates and cabinet liners in both standard and fire retardant grades.
